author: Renz Ofiaza
title: Pharrell Willams’ Childhood to be Made Into a Musical Film
text:
With a resume that spans from music, footwear, design and more, cultural icon Pharrell Williams is now in the works to partake in a Romeo & Juliet- style musical film based on his childhood in Virginia Beach.
The massive success of La La Land has certainly peaked the interest of studios, as FOX has reportedly signed on for the project entitled, Atlantis , according to The Hollywood Reporter . With Michael Mayer directing, known for his Broadway work on Spring Awakening , for which he won a Tony Award — Toy Story 4 writer Martin Hynes will also write Atlantis , while Williams and Mimi Valdes will produce the project via their I Am Other endeavor. Gil Netter of Life of Pi will also serve as a co-producer.
Interestingly, Williams’ endeavor on film continues to rise, as he was a producer on FOX ‘s acclaimed hit Hidden Figures , which was nominated for three Oscars.
In addition, he wrote songs for the film that starred Octavia Spencer, Taraji P. Henson and Janelle Monae — and most notably, the hit “Happy” from Despicable Me 2 for which he received an Oscar nomination.
